arts.ttl: EXCLUSIVE: Tottenham refuse to back down as Wolves fight to retain Matheus Cunha
arts.sum: EXCLUSIVE: Tottenham refuse to back down as Wolves fight to retain Matheus Cunha FootballTransfers understands the club is eager to open contract negotiations with Cunha and make him the highest-paid player at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Disappointing end to season for Oâ€™Gorman in FIM JuniorGP in Estoril
arts.sum: Ten laps down, whilst firmly in the front group, brake failure caused the youngster to collide with another rider ending his race spectating from the sides. The 17 year old placed his 250cc Team Estrella Galicia 0,0 Honda at the head of the third row in seventh for the start of the first of two 16 lap races at the Portuguese track.

arts.ttl: "He's top drawer. Got a bit of everything.": Tim Sherwood on Wolves forward Matheus Cunha
arts.sum: Tim Sherwood reveals which Wolves forward could play for Liverpool or Arsenal.
